channel.title: Host Evidence Collection And Analysis on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in Host Evidence Collection And Analysis on Analyst

item.title: Host Evidence Analysis
item.description: SANS Six-Part Methodology Used to identify malicious processses: Identify rogue processes Analyze DLLs and handles Review network artifacts Look for code injection Check for any signs of a rootkit Dump suspicious process and drivers File System Analysis Refer to this article about different file systems and this - on how to recover the data from them.

item.title: Dead Acquisition Steps
item.description: ⚠️ First step!! Logical Backup - doesn’t copy all, doesn’t copy slack, free space and deleted files.

item.title: Live Acquisition Steps
item.description: Logical Backup - doesn’t copy all, doesn’t copy slack, free space and deleted files. Imaging - bit-by-bit copy.

item.title: First Response Process Overview
item.description: First responders first arrive on the scene. Not always they are digital forensic experts. But what if I get so lucky to be the first responder?
